name: Colum and His Friends
detailed_description:
Colum Mitchstock, the puppet character of the 40's along with his friends for a number of seasons, cartoons, and kids puppet shows! Back at the studio, years after being closed down for UN-explainable reasons. Collecting the old cartoons back at the studio, it was not how it was before. Something bad happened, like always.

Started in 1902. Ends the way you decide.

Figure out the mystery, free the puppets, and destroy the magic wand.

short_description: The puppet studio is getting demolished on Friday after years of the place being untouched. Hush on over there and archive some old things. However, you found out something terrible happened. Unable to leave until Friday. Find a way to escape, and survive as Colum Mitchstock will hunt you down.
